verses.verse: And when king <WH4428> Arad <WH6166> the Kanahanite <WH3669>, which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> in the south <WH5045>, heard <WH8085> <WH8799> tell that Yisra'EL <WH3478> came <WH935> <WH8802> by the way <WH1870> of the spies <WH871>; then he fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and took <WH7617> <WH8799> some of them prisoners <WH7628>.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> vowed <WH5087> <WH8799> a vow <WH5088> unto the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, If thou wilt indeed <WH5414> <WH8800> deliver <WH5414> <WH8799> this people <WH5971> into my hand <WH3027>, then I will utterly destroy <WH2763> <WH8689> their cities <WH5892>.

And the YY <WH3068> hearkened <WH8085> <WH8799> to the voice <WH6963> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and delivered up <WH5414> <WH8799> the Kanahanites <WH3669>; and they utterly destroyed <WH2763> <WH8686> them and their cities <WH5892>: and he called <WH7121> <WH8799> the name <WH8034> of the place <WH4725> Hormah <WH2767>.

And they journeyed <WH5265> <WH8799> from mount <WH2022> Hor <WH2023> by the way <WH1870> of the Red <WH5488> sea <WH3220>, to compass <WH5437> <WH8800> the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>: and the soul <WH5315> of the people <WH5971> was much discouraged <WH7114> <WH8799> because of the way <WH1870>.

And the people <WH5971> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> against 'Elohim <WH430>, and against Mosheh <WH4872>, Wherefore have ye brought us up <WH5927> <WH8689> out of Egypt <WH4714> to die <WH4191> <WH8800> in the wilderness <WH4057>? for there is no bread <WH3899>, neither is there any water <WH4325>; and our soul <WH5315> loatheth <WH6973> <WH8804> this light <WH7052> bread <WH3899>.

And the YY <WH3068> sent <WH7971> <WH8762> fiery <WH8314> serpents <WH5175> among the people <WH5971>, and they bit <WH5391> <WH8762> the people <WH5971>; and much <WH7227> people <WH5971> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> died <WH4191> <WH8799>.

Therefore the people <WH5971> came <WH935> <WH8799> to Mosheh <WH4872>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, We have sinned <WH2398> <WH8804>, for we have spoken <WH1696> <WH8765> against the YY <WH3068>, and against thee; pray <WH6419> <WH8690> unto the YY <WH3068>, that he take away <WH5493> <WH8686> the serpents <WH5175> from us. And Mosheh <WH4872> prayed <WH6419> <WH8691> for the people <WH5971>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Make <WH6213> <WH8798> thee a fiery serpent <WH8314>, and set <WH7760> <WH8798> it upon a pole <WH5251>: and it shall come to pass, that every one that is bitten <WH5391> <WH8803>, when he looketh <WH7200> <WH8804> upon it, shall live <WH2425> <WH8804>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> made <WH6213> <WH8799> a serpent <WH5175> of brass <WH5178>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> it upon a pole <WH5251>, and it came to pass, that if a serpent <WH5175> had bitten <WH5391> <WH8804> any man <WH376>, when he beheld <WH5027> <WH8689> the serpent <WH5175> of brass <WH5178>, he lived <WH2425> <WH8804>.
And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> set forward <WH5265> <WH8799>, and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> in Oboth <WH88>.

And they journeyed <WH5265> <WH8799> from Oboth <WH88>, and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> at Ijeabarim <WH5863>, in the wilderness <WH4057> which is before <WH6440> Moab <WH4124>, toward the sunrising <WH4217> <WH8121>.
From thence they removed <WH5265> <WH8804>, and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> in the valley <WH5158> of Zared <WH2218>.

From thence they removed <WH5265> <WH8804>, and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> on the other side <WH5676> of Arnon <WH769>, which is in the wilderness <WH4057> that cometh out <WH3318> <WH8802> of the coasts <WH1366> of the Amorites <WH567>: for Arnon <WH769> is the border <WH1366> of Moab <WH4124>, between Moab <WH4124> and the Amorites <WH567>.
Wherefore it is said <WH559> <WH8735> in the book <WH5612> of the wars <WH4421> of the YY <WH3068>, What he did <WH2052> in the Red sea <WH5492>, and in the brooks <WH5158> of Arnon <WH769>,

And at the stream <WH793> of the brooks <WH5158> that goeth down <WH5186> <WH8804> to the dwelling <WH3427> <WH8800> of Ar <WH6144>, and lieth <WH8172> <WH8738> upon the border <WH1366> of Moab <WH4124>.

And from thence they went to Beer <WH876>: that is the well <WH875> whereof the YY <WH3068> spake <WH559> <WH8804> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Gater <WH622> the people <WH5971> together <WH622> <WH8798>, and I will give <WH5414> <WH8799> them water <WH4325>.
Then Yisra'EL <WH3478> sang <WH7891> <WH8799> this song <WH7892>, Spring up <WH5927> <WH8798>, O well <WH875>; sing <WH6030> <WH8798> ye unto it:

The princes <WH8269> digged <WH2658> <WH8804> the well <WH875>, the nobles <WH5081> of the people <WH5971> digged <WH3738> <WH8804> it, by the direction of the Torahgiver <WH2710> <WH8781>, with their staves <WH4938>. And from the wilderness <WH4057> they went to Mattanah <WH4980>:
And from Mattanah <WH4980> to Nahaliel <WH5160>: and from Nahaliel <WH5160> to Bamoth <WH1120>:

And from Bamoth <WH1120> in the valley <WH1516>, that is in the country <WH7704> of Moab <WH4124>, to the top <WH7218> of Pisgah <WH6449>, which looketh <WH8259> <WH8738> toward <WH6440> Jeshimon <WH3452>.
And Yisra'EL <WH3478> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> messengers <WH4397> unto Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Let me pass <WH5674> <WH8799> through thy land <WH776>: we will not turn <WH5186> <WH8799> into the fields <WH7704>, or into the vineyards <WH3754>; we will not drink <WH8354> <WH8799> of the waters <WH4325> of the well <WH875>: but we will go along <WH3212> <WH8799> by the king's <WH4428> high way <WH1870>, until we be past <WH5674> <WH8799> thy borders <WH1366>.

And Sichon <WH5511> would not suffer <WH5414> <WH8804> Yisra'EL <WH3478> to pass <WH5674> <WH8800> through his border <WH1366>: but Sichon <WH5511> gathered <WH622> all his people <WH5971> together <WH622> <WH8799>, and went out <WH3318> <WH8799> against <WH7125> <WH8800> Yisra'EL <WH3478> into the wilderness <WH4057>: and he came <WH935> <WH8799> to YAHaz <WH3096>, and fought <WH3898> <WH8735> against Yisra'EL <WH3478>.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> smote <WH5221> <WH8686> him with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and possessed <WH3423> <WH8799> his land <WH776> from Arnon <WH769> unto Yabok <WH2999>, even unto the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983>: for the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Ammon <WH5983> was strong <WH5794>.

And Yisra'EL <WH3478> took <WH3947> <WH8799> all these cities <WH5892>: and Yisra'EL <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in all the cities <WH5892> of the Amorites <WH567>, in Heshbon <WH2809>, and in all the villages <WH1323> thereof.

For Heshbon <WH2809> was the city <WH5892> of Sichon <WH5511> the king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, who had fought <WH3898> <WH8738> against the former <WH7223> king <WH4428> of Moab <WH4124>, and taken <WH3947> <WH8799> all his land <WH776> out of his hand <WH3027>, even unto Arnon <WH769>.

Wherefore they that speak in proverbs <WH4911> <WH8802> say <WH559> <WH8799>, Come <WH935> <WH8798> into Heshbon <WH2809>, let the city <WH5892> of Sichon <WH5511> be built <WH1129> <WH8735> and prepared <WH3559> <WH8709>:

For there is a fire <WH784> gone out <WH3318> <WH8804> of Heshbon <WH2809>, a flame <WH3852> from the city <WH7151> of Sichon <WH5511>: it hath consumed <WH398> <WH8804> Ar <WH6144> of Moab <WH4124>, and the lords of the high places <WH1181> of Arnon <WH769>.

Woe <WH188> to thee, Moab <WH4124> ! thou art undone <WH6> <WH8804>, O people <WH5971> of K'mosh <WH3645>: he hath given <WH5414> <WH8804> his sons <WH1121> that escaped <WH6412>, and his daughters <WH1323>, into captivity <WH7622> unto Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>.

We have shot <WH3384> <WH8799> at them; Heshbon <WH2809> is perished <WH6> <WH8804> even unto Dibon <WH1769>, and we have laid them waste <WH8074> <WH8686> even unto Nophah <WH5302>, which reacheth unto Medeba <WH4311>.
Thus Yisra'EL <WH3478> dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in the land <WH776> of the Amorites <WH567>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> sent <WH7971> <WH8799> to spy out <WH7270> <WH8763> Jaazer <WH3270>, and they took <WH3920> <WH8799> the villages <WH1323> thereof, and drove out <WH3423> <WH8686> <WH8675> <WH3423> <WH8799> the Amorites <WH567> that were there.

And they turned <WH6437> <WH8799> and went up <WH5927> <WH8799> by the way <WH1870> of Bashan <WH1316>: and Og <WH5747> the king <WH4428> of Bashan <WH1316> went out <WH3318> <WH8799> against <WH7125> <WH8800> them, he, and all his people <WH5971>, to the battle <WH4421> at Edrei <WH154>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Fear <WH3372> <WH8799> him not: for I have delivered <WH5414> <WH8804> him into thy hand <WH3027>, and all his people <WH5971>, and his land <WH776>; and thou shalt do <WH6213> <WH8804> to him as thou didst <WH6213> <WH8804> unto Sichon <WH5511> king <WH4428> of the Amorites <WH567>, which dwelt <WH3427> <WH8802> at Heshbon <WH2809>.

So they smote <WH5221> <WH8686> him, and his sons <WH1121>, and all his people <WH5971>, until there was none <WH1115> left <WH7604> <WH8689> him alive <WH8300>: and they possessed <WH3423> <WH8799> his land <WH776>.
